titles.title: Care Packages for Our Heroes Act of 2023
Care Packages for Our Heroes Act of 2023

To amend title 39, United States Code, to direct the United States Postal Service to establish rates of postage for packages shipped by priority mail from the United States to a foreign Army Post Office, Fleet Post Office, or Diplomatic Post Office, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary:
Care Packages for Our Heroes Act of 2023
This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to establish rates of postage for packages shipped by priority mail from the United States to a foreign Army Post Office, Fleet Post Office, or Diplomatic Post Office address that limit the charge for distance traveled.
